title: Ukraine Looks to Cement Full Control of Kherson After Russian Retreat
description: Power remains out in the strategic southern city as Moscow consolidates positions further south and to the east.

title: As Russian Army Falters in Ukraine, Paramilitary Leader Close to Putin Flexes Power
description: Yevgeny Prigozhin, founder of the Wagner Group, is using his force’s battlefield presence to gain sway with the Kremlin and shape military decisions.

title: Israel Faces Pressure to Provide Air-Defense Systems to Ukraine
description: Kyiv is hoping a new government in Jerusalem and Russia’s use of Iranian-made drones will help make the case for assistance.
